name: Delta Fighters (Berseba Games)
description:
Prepare to join the Fight!

Help the Delta Fighters battle against the enemies from the Solar System in a retro and addictive arcade war. 

Travel across 7 Different worlds destroying all sort of enemies that want to rule the Universe. 

* Addictive Gameplay

* 21 Different Levels of pure nostalgia 

* Beautiful 8bit graphics

* Hardcore Bosses!

The Delta Fighters are waiting for you! Download now and have a lot of fun!
